title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.2: LEARNING OUTCOMES AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Output 2.4 Every Child learns: LAC COs have increased capacity to develop, implement and deliver results for every child to access ECD and education opportunities and learn, including in emergencies, fragile and humanitarian contexts.

mailing-address.narrative: P.O. Box 0843-03045 Panama Republica de Panama

sector.narrative: System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - mainstreaming of skills development within national education/training system

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.4 Every Child learns: LAC COs have increased capacity to develop, implement and deliver results for every child to access ECD and education opportunities and learn, including in emergencies, fragile and humanitarian contexts.

description.narrative: 19 LAC countries participated in the piloting of the Regional Comparative and Explanatory Study (ERCE 2019), improving their capacities to assess learning outcome and to design evidence-based responses. Countries in the region count on evidence on factors contributing to increasing access to early childhood learning opportunities to inform policy development. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/02/2019

title.narrative: Number of countries participating in regional standardized learning assessments which benefit form updated data and policy recommendations on improving learning outcomes
Number of countries implementing policies or programs aimed to improve learning outcomes from early years to adolescents with an equity focus, using UNICEF

Number of countries designing and implementing alternative education modalities and programmes, including Accelerated Learning Programs (ALPs), with UNICEF support, targeting marginalized adolescents.
